actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to delay the effective date of a standard applicable to hydraulic service brake systems and associated parking brake systems.

summary.text: Delays until September 1, 1980, implementation of the order issued by the Secretary of Transportation setting a standard by hydraulic brake systems and associated parking brake systems originally scheduled to become effective September 1, 1975.

titles.title: A bill to delay the effective date of a standard applicable to hydraulic service brake systems and associated parking brake systems.
